Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is a breach of basic human rights and free speech, which are fundamental for a democracy.
The government should not be the arbiter of truth as it has previously censored information and expert opinions.
The government has spread misinformation about COVID-19 and its vaccines, which undermines its credibility to regulate misinformation.
The COVID-19 vaccines have been misrepresented in terms of safety and efficacy, leading to significant public health issues.
There is a need for a Royal Commission into the approval and claims regarding COVID-19 vaccines due to their alleged adverse effects.
Notable Quotes: It is a breach of basic human rights, and free speech which is fundamental for a democracy.
The government – who proposes to be the arbiter of truth – is guilty of censoring information now known to true.
There is absolutely no doubt our government spread misinformation and outright lies about COVID and the COVID injections.
These statistics are staggering and should lead to a Royal Commission into the Therapeutic Goods Administration’s Provisional approval and release of the COVID-19 injections.
